Name: janos slynt
Sentence: It's the Hando s tournament that's causing all this trouble, my Lords.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: Call it what you will, Lord Stark Ser, the city is packed with people and more flooding in every day. Last night we had a tavern riot, a brothel fire, three stabbings and a drunken horse race down the Street of Sisters.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: Thank you, my Lord Hand Ser. They will be put to good use.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: A bastard son of a traitor. What would you expect?

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: The free folk? Listen to him. He even talks like a wildling now.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: You admit to breaking your vows, then?

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: The law is the law. The boy must die.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: Going to visit your wildling whore?

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: No? Maybe I'll give her a copper tonight and find out.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: For now. But you can't be acting commander forever. There will be a choosing. The old maester will insist on it. You might reconsider his request to marchon Craster's. Let the mutineer stake care of Snow. Or you might be taking orders from him the rest of your life.

Name: janos slynt
Sentence: I'm surprised you didn't ride over and say hello. The King-beyond-the-Wall is your old friend, isn't he?
